name: shooter2dJ
description:
This is my project for course "Game Design and Development 1: 2D Shooter".

Credits

Created by: JoseQA

Modifications

  • New player (sprite, collider and death).
  • New animated cursor.
  • Player lives info at the left of the screen.
  • Enemies to defeat to pass level info at the left of the screen.
  • 3 different levels:
    • Level 1: defeat the 6 enemies of the level.
    • Level 2: defeat 25 enemies.
    • Level 3: defeat as many enemies you can (enemies are generated infinitely).
  • Instructions screen.
